execution_plan.description: Find all goods (their ids and prices) that cost more than 15 dollars from the goods database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE price > 15;

execution_plan.description: Find items (receipt ids and item identifiers) whose Item matches any good id returned from step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get receipt dates for receipts referenced by the items found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);
